display.title: Display

language.label: Interface Language
language.description: Select the language for the application interface

scale.presetsDescription: Quick scale options for common preferences

general.agentFrameworkDescription: The coding framework used for autonomous tasks
general.aiTerminalNamingDescription: Automatically name terminals based on commands (uses Haiku)
general.featureModelSettingsDescription: Model and thinking level for Insights, Ideation, and Roadmap
general.pythonPathDescription: Path to Python executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.gitPathDescription: Path to Git executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.githubCLIPathDescription: Path to GitHub CLI (gh) executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.claudePathDescription: Path to Claude CLI executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.autoClaudePathDescription: Relative path to auto-claude directory in projects
general.autoNameTerminalsDescription: Use AI to generate descriptive names for terminal tabs based on their activity

theme.title: Appearance
theme.modeDescription: Choose between light and dark themes
theme.appearanceModeDescription: Choose light, dark, or system preference
theme.colorThemeDescription: Select a color palette for the interface

dusk.name: Dusk
dusk.description: Warmer variant with slightly lighter dark mode

lime.name: Lime
lime.description: Fresh, energetic lime with purple accents

devtools.title: Developer Tools
devtools.description: Configure your preferred IDE and terminal for working with worktrees

ide.label: Preferred IDE
ide.description: Auto Claude will open worktrees in this editor

terminal.label: Preferred Terminal
terminal.description: Auto Claude will open terminal sessions here

devtools.noToolsDetected: No additional tools detected (VS Code and system terminal will be used)

updates.title: Updates
updates.updateDownloaded: Update downloaded! Click Install to restart and apply the update.
updates.autoUpdateProjectsDescription: Automatically update Auto Claude in projects when a new version is available
updates.betaUpdatesDescription: Receive pre-release beta versions with new features (may be less stable)

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.onTaskCompleteDescription: Notify when a task finishes successfully
notifications.onTaskFailedDescription: Notify when a task encounters an error
notifications.onReviewNeededDescription: Notify when QA requires your review

ide.description: Auto Claude will open worktrees in this editor

terminal.label: Preferred Terminal
terminal.description: Auto Claude will open terminal sessions here

general.title: General
general.useClaudeMdDescription: Include CLAUDE.md instructions in agent context

claude.title: Claude Authentication
claude.description: Configure Claude CLI authentication for this project. Supported: sessionKey from browser (recommended) or OAuth token
claude.initMessage: Initialize Auto-Build first to configure claude authentication
claude.sessionKeyDescription: Copy from browser: DevTools (F12) → Application → Cookies → claude.ai → sessionKey

linear.title: Linear Integration
linear.description: Connect to Linear for issue tracking and task import
linear.guardDescription: Sync with Linear for issue tracking
linear.initMessage: Initialize Auto-Build first to configure linear integration

github.title: GitHub Integration
github.description: Connect to GitHub for issue tracking
github.initMessage: Initialize Auto-Build first to configure github integration

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Configure persistent cross-session memory for agents
memory.initMessage: Initialize Auto-Build first to configure memory

agentProfile.label: Agent Profile
agentProfile.title: Default Agent Profile
agentProfile.sectionDescription: Select a preset configuration for model and thinking level
agentProfile.profilesInfo: Agent profiles provide preset configurations for Claude model and thinking level. When you create a new task, these settings will be used as defaults. You can always override them in the task creation wizard.
agentProfile.phaseConfigurationDescription: Customize model and thinking level for each phase
agentProfile.phaseConfigNote: These settings will be used as defaults when creating new tasks with the Auto profile. You can override them per-task in the task creation wizard.

auto.name: Auto (Optimized)
auto.description: Uses Opus across all phases with optimized thinking levels

complex.name: Complex Tasks
complex.description: For intricate, multi-step implementations requiring deep analysis

balanced.name: Balanced
balanced.description: Good balance of speed and quality for most tasks

quick.name: Quick Edits
quick.description: Fast iterations for simple changes and quick fixes

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Manage Claude accounts and API keys
integrations.claudeAccountsDescription: Add multiple Claude subscriptions to automatically switch between them when you hit rate limits.
integrations.runSetupToken: Run claude setup-token to get your token
integrations.autoSwitchingDescription: Automatically switch between Claude accounts to avoid interruptions. Configure proactive monitoring to switch before hitting limits.
integrations.masterSwitch: Master switch for all auto-swap features
integrations.proactiveDescription: Check usage regularly and swap before hitting limits
integrations.sessionThresholdDescription: Switch when session usage reaches this level (recommended: 95%)
integrations.weeklyThresholdDescription: Switch when weekly usage reaches this level (recommended: 99%)
integrations.reactiveDescription: Auto-swap when unexpected rate limit is hit
integrations.apiKeysInfo: Keys set here are used as defaults. Individual projects can override these in their settings.

debug.title: Debug & Logs
debug.description: Access logs and debug information for troubleshooting
debug.helpText: When reporting bugs, click "Copy Debug Info" to get system information and recent errors that help us diagnose the issue.

projectSettings.generalDescription: Configure Auto-Build, agent model, and notifications for {{projectName}}
projectSettings.initializeDescription: Initialize Auto-Build to enable task creation and agent workflows.
projectSettings.agentModelDescription: Select the AI model for task execution
projectSettings.enableDesktopNotifications: Enable desktop notifications when tasks finish

githubOAuth.cliRequiredDescription: The GitHub CLI (gh) is required for OAuth authentication. This provides a secure way to authenticate without manually creating tokens.
githubOAuth.connectDescription: Click the button below to authenticate with GitHub. This will open your browser where you can authorize the application.
githubOAuth.completeInBrowser: Please complete the authentication in your browser. This window will update automatically.
githubOAuth.waitingForAuth: Waiting for authentication flow to start...
githubOAuth.enterCodeInBrowser: Enter this code in your browser to complete authentication.
githubOAuth.copyCodeThenOpen: Copy this code, then open the link below to authenticate.
githubOAuth.accountConnected: Your GitHub account is now connected
githubOAuth.browserFailedDescription: The browser couldn't be opened automatically. Please visit the URL below to complete authentication:
